title: Ranked SoloQ all players got laggs since 1:45 (5000 ping)
body:
I just played Soloq and at 1:45 i got really hard laggs and all players couldnt move, attack or do something cause everything lagged hard.
All things happend 10 sec later.

Thats okay, cause i've played almost 3000 game in League and it is the first time i got a match like this.
But i am really angry because i LOST 15 LP.

Please Riot fix.

replies.body: Please go to the english board.
